text: Jonathan Yudis is an American film director. He made his feature film debut in 2005 with Pervert!, a tribute to the films of Russ Meyer. He also directed the live-action segments of the Ren and Stimpy Adult Party Cartoon episode Firedogs 2. His wife is the daughter of filmmaker Ralph Bakshi. In 2015 he was directing the comedy film Aloha Santa. ==References== ==External links== * *Q&A; with Jonathan Yudis Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Artists from Philadelphia Category:Film directors from Pennsylvania Category:American male screenwriters Category:Film producers from Pennsylvania Category:American television writers Category:American television directors Category:American animators Category:American animated film directors Category:American animated film producers Category:Television producers from Pennsylvania Category:American male voice actors Category:American male film actors Category:21st-century American male actors Category:Screenwriters from Pennsylvania Category:American male television writers
title: Jonathan Yudis
